summary: A dark retexture of UberSmaug 's Battlemage Armor.
descriptionHtml:
So the long short of it is as follows;

Was looking through mods, came across the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32598/?]Heart Breaker[/url] mod (downladed, yet to get to use ingame yet) and I fell in love with the armor of the title character. I've used the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63854/?]Battlemage Armor[/url] before, so I knew what it was, but I'd never seen the dark retexture or amazing hood combo the pictured character had. The hood and mask are also one of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1817573/?]lRekol's[/url] mods the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9645/?]Black Mage Armor[/url]. An amazing mod by itself let alone with the battlemage armor retex. So I grabbed that and went back to looking for the darker battlemage retex, to no avail, but the UberSmaug provided the psd files on his page for user to do whatever with. So I downloaded that, and a free trial of photoshop, and learned to do just enough to make the armor look good. I mean, I think it looks good anyway.
(I also tried my hand with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77315/]Resplendent Armor[/url] but it didn't turn out as well as I had hoped it would, I'll post pictures and maybe upload it as an optional file if anyone wants it. It's a much darker version of the tarnished armor)
Overall with tweaking the weird colors I kept coming up with, it took me like an hour to retex the whole thing.

Required files are obviously the Battlemage Armor linked above.

Strongly recommended files are the Black Mage Armor and Heart Breaker.



Ps: If you want a personal color scheme I might be able to do it for you, leave a  comment and I'll see what I can do
author: YamatoHotsuin
